@zawarudolunatic
This wasn't a manga built from the ground up as a storied anthology which is why it seems fractured from a narrative standpoint. It is a collection of various short stories and content that he uploaded to his fantia(Japanese patreon equivalent) over the course of 1-2 years with some extra stuff thrown in. This guy is a genius at double-dipping lol. He even went on to publish some his fantia content for an anthology in Comic Unreal.

One of the authors many fantasy works, though this time its has less focus about the narrative but more on degenerate stuff. From the get-go, the way the comic is structured already implies that the author does not have the intention whatsoever to focus on story telling. He gets into the action quickly and has minimal story-telling. It has all kinds of depraves fetishes starting from hypnosis, stopped time, supplanting personalities and treating women as objects. The worst is when one of the characters basically goes through the despair event horizon. If you can't handle that, this doujin will mess you up. The doujin does take a few odd turns that may or may not interest you though personally I chuckled a bit. The premise is already so deranged and absurd, some additional abursity wouldn't hurt. RATING: 7/10.... but that's just because I don't like women being treated so terribly BUT I cant ignore the effort and heart the author put into this work. Incredible work as always

For the people complaining about the plot or some even literally 'crying' about it, get over it lmao... This is something that Fan no Hitori does in all of his works, and it's a hentai, it's not supposed to be some incredulous world building with a happy end; if you don't like it go read something else.

@Keksz I know, right? If the author kept this kind of thing up, then there might actually be enough worldbuilding for there to be an interesting story in here. Albeit one that takes place a while before this mind-controlled orgy of sex.
